import React from 'react' import FormButton from '../../components/ui/FormButton' import useFormContext from '../../Hooks/useFormContext' import FormFields from './FormFields' function RegistrationForm() { const { step, setStep, userData, stepTitle, canSubmit, disabledNext, disabledPrev, hideNext, hideSubmit, prevButtonText } = useFormContext() const handlePrev = () => setStep(prev => prev - 1) const handleNext = () => setStep(prev => prev + 1) const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() console.log(JSON.stringify(userData)) } return (
{stepTitle[step]}
) } export default RegistrationForm
